mapper.sql: B_G_00901.ID, B_G_00901.MAINID, B_G_00901.ZXFL, B_G_00901.FJZCH, B_G_00901.ZJQDID, B_G_00901.BJH, B_G_00901.BJXLH, B_G_00901.JKXMBH_F, B_G_00901.JKFLBH_F, B_G_00901.JKZ_F, B_G_00901.JKXMBH_S, B_G_00901.JKFLBH_S, B_G_00901.JKZ_S, B_G_00901.JKXMBH_T, B_G_00901.JKFLBH_T, B_G_00901.JKZ_T, B_G_00901.XH, B_G_00901.GDH, B_G_00901.ZT, B_G_00901.WHDWID, B_G_00901.WHRID, B_G_00901.WHSJ, B_G_00901.DPRTCODE,B_G_00901.JHGS_RS, B_G_00901.JHGS_XSS
mapper.select: select ,a.zwms||' '|| a.ywms as bjms from B_G_00901 left join d_008 a on B_G_00901.bjh=a.bjh and B_G_00901.Dprtcode = a.dprtcode and a.zt = 1 where B_G_00901.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.ID, a.MAINID, a.ZXFL, a.FJZCH, a.ZJQDID, a.BJH, a.BJXLH, a.JKXMBH_F, a.JKFLBH_F, a.JKZ_F,
a.JKXMBH_S, a.JKFLBH_S, a.JKZ_S, a.JKXMBH_T, a.JKFLBH_T, a.JKZ_T, a.XH, a.GDH, a.ZT, a.WHDWID,
a.WHRID, a.WHSJ, a.DPRTCODE,a.JHGS_RS, a.JHGS_XSS ,b.ywms||' '||b.zwms bjms,b.ywms,b.zwms
from B_G_00901 a left join d_008 b on a.BJH=b.bjh and a.dprtcode=b.dprtcode and b.zt=1 where a.MAINID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.xh
